rules_text:
Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with total mana value 5 or less from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Coalesce {5}{G}{W} [i](You may cast this for {5}{G}{W} from your graveyard. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as an Angel Horror creature. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
Flying, lifelink
